trans-unit.source: Represents a DSL model element that exposes property changing/changed events.
trans-unit.target: 表示可公开属性更改/已更改事件的 DSL 模型元素。

trans-unit.source: DSL model elements support property change events through their custom property descriptors.
trans-unit.target: DSL 模型元素支持通过其自定义属性描述符的属性更改事件。

trans-unit.source: These model elements are used, for example, by WPF data binding.
trans-unit.target: 模型将使用这些元素，例如，WPF 数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: However, they are not very convenient for programmatic use.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们不是以编程方式使用非常方便的。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] supports the "traditional" <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanging> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interfaces, WPF prefers them over the property descriptor for two-way binding which fail because they do not use implicit transactions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]支持"传统"<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanging>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>接口，WPF 优先选择这些双向绑定，这将失败，因为它们不使用隐式事务的属性描述符。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] DSL model elements implement the traditional events without implementing the interfaces themselves.
trans-unit.target: 因此， [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] DSL 模型元素而无需实现的接口本身实现传统的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a DSL model element has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 DSL 模型元素更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a DSL model element is being changed.
trans-unit.target: 在要更改 DSL 模型元素时发生。
